Text: I heard the reputation of this book. If I'm able to get -- then will seed to 2000%. I hope that brings life to this torrent.

Can you please seed this book again
Thanks

This PDF is incomplete. It's missing pages, such as 170 and 171. It's the same incomplete torrent found all over the internet.

BTW it *is* an interesting read. I'm neither a believer nor a skeptic, but a very open-minded realist, and some of this makes a lot more sense than the goofy-as-hell religions we're taught as kids.

It even seems Buddhism may be the path to realizing the evolution of the soul/spirit as put forth by this book and by others.

(Theravada Buddhism that is, the original teachings of the Buddha before China, Japan and Tibet for instance "melded" it with their own religions and customs/traditions. The original Buddhism is an entirely scientific method without any faith/beliefs or mysticism bullshit.)
